info.title: MuK REST API for Odoo
info.description: Download the [REST API](https://www.odoo.com/apps/modules/12.0/muk_rest/) for [Odoo](https://www.odoo.com). </br> </br> Enables a REST API for the Odoo server. The API has routes to authenticate and retrieve a token. Afterwards, a set of routes to interact with the server are provided. The API can be used by any language or framework which can make an HTTP requests and receive responses with JSON payloads and works with both the Community and the Enterprise Edition.

post.description: Request system information. All headers must be passed via the OAuth header.

get.description: Authenticates the user with the Odoo server.

post.description: Exchange temporary credentials with the access token. All headers must be passed via the OAuth header.

get.description: Authenticates the user with the Odoo server. All headers must be passed via the OAuth header. </br> The Web Application Flow is taken as an example. </br> The API supports all 4 OAuth2 Grant Types.

post.description: Fetches the access token from the server. All headers must be passed via the OAuth header. </br> The Web Application Flow is taken as an example. </br> The API supports all 4 OAuth2 Grant Types.

scopes.all: Basic security settings without additional restrictions
